  • ABOUT

My background in visual arts, front-end development and interaction design has allowed me to have a multifaceted perspective and appreciation for my work in UX/UI design.

As a positive, inquisitive and self-driven designer I'm passionate about all things of design. Some of my recent activities include:

  • Learning Figma (a trending design tool) and migrating my design work to this platform.
  • Developing and promoting a design system
  • Completing a Neilson Norman Group UX course on &qu Emerging Patterns in Interface Design
  • Created some animations clips in Principle for a product launch

I'm also a believer of giving back to society with my work in promoting social good, volunteering my time and skills for non profits, design education. Recen

Havng over 12 years of experience working in the tech industry has enabled me to acquire the technical skills and the soft skills to execute and collaborate with successful outcomes in the tech industry. I've had the pleasure to design for Samsung, Public Health Agency of Canada, British Columbia's Institute of Technology, Goa Games (a gaming subsidiary of Orange), and many small businesses.

Empathy

Understanding users needs and goals help me to make informed design decisions.

Simplicity

Keeping the user journey clear and simple helps users complete the intended task.

Intuition

Intuitive design affords the user enjoyable and frictionless experience.

When I am offline, you can find me spending time with my wife and daughter, going on a bike ride, craving a bowl of ramen, or reading something design-related.

I am currently available for user experience design, user interface design and front end development projects. If you can, please include any relevant information such as the budget, scope and delivery date. I look forward to hearing from you!
